formula.name: 4th Celtic Imag Quasi Perpendicular / Heart
formula.reference: Xrn = abs(Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2) + Cr; Xin = 4 * Xr * abs(Xi * Xr2 - Xi * Xi2) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = diffabs(Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2,4 * Xi2 * Xi * xi - 12 * Xi2 * xr * Xr + 6 * Xi2 * xi2 - 6 * Xi2 * xr2 - 12 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 24 * Xr * Xi * xr * xi + 4 * xi2 * xi * Xi - 12 * xi * Xi * xr2 + 4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr - 6 * Xr2 * xi2 + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 - 12 * xi2 * Xr * xr + 4 * xr2 * xr * Xr + xi2 * xi2 - 6 * xi2 * xr2 + xr2 * xr2) + cr; xin = 4 * xr * abs( - Xi2 * Xi - 3 * xi * Xi2 + Xr2 * Xi + 2 * xr * Xr * Xi - 3 * xi2 * Xi + xr2 * Xi + xi * Xr2 + 2 * xr * xi * Xr - xi2 * xi + xr2 * xi) + 4 * Xr * diffabs( - Xi2 * Xi + Xr2 * Xi, - 3 * xi * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xr * Xi - 3 * xi2 * Xi + xr2 * Xi + xi * Xr2 + 2 * xr * xi * Xr - xi2 * xi + xr2 * xi) + ci;
